items.abstract: <jats:p>Problems on the role of greenery of former manors in the urban structure are discussed in the paper. Importance of integrating manor greenery into an urban environment is analyzed. A few examples of relationship between manor greenery and urban structures are described. Distinguishing features of manor greenery in the context of town greenery are established. The purpose of the paper lies in discussing the following issues: usage of former manor greenery, its protection in an urbanized environment, and prospects of its usage for quantitative and qualitative urban development.</jats:p>
title: GREENERY OF FORMER MANOR SITES IN THE CONTEXT OF URBAN DEVELOPMENT
